respondTask(bytes32,bytes,uint48,bytes).notice: Store an attested result after settlement verification. The off-chain node signs `abi.encode(taskId, payload)` where `payload = abi.encode(bool isOwner, address ownerAtBlock, uint64 observedBlock)`.
